statements: DELETE FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE is_available = FALSE;
DELETE FROM virtual_room_availability WHERE room_name = 'Conference Room A' AND occupancy_capacity > 10 AND is_available = true;
DELETE FROM RoomAvailability WHERE is_available = TRUE AND room_id = 1;
DELETE FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE meeting_date = '2022-10-15' AND start_time = '09:00:00';
DELETE FROM reservations WHERE room_id = 10 AND reservation_date = '2022-01-20';
DELETE FROM MeetingParticipant WHERE meeting_id = 1 AND participant_id = 101;
DELETE FROM MeetingParticipant WHERE participant_id = 123 AND meeting_id = 456;
DELETE FROM Participant WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_id = 100 AND room_id = 4;
